analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ZURNote.swapForToken (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol#459-463):
	External calls:
	- ERC20(ZUR).transfer(msg.sender,notes.mul(rate).div(10 ** uint256(decimals))) (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol)
	- transfer(feeAddress,fee) (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol)
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol)

ZURNote.swapFornote (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol#436-448) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(this).mint(msg.sender,_amt.mul(10 ** uint256(decimals)).div(rate)) (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol#444-446)

ZURNote.swapForToken (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol#459-463) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(ZUR).transfer(msg.sender,notes.mul(rate).div(10 ** uint256(decimals))) (/unique_chucks/48/0x0f979f5edf52a9309d0025b1c74824bf97ac400e.sol)
